short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Play Retrobowl as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.ca: Jouez à Retrobowl en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez-le dès maintenant!
short.es: ¡Juega a Retrobowl como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Retrobowlit Chrome'i laiendusena - Proovi kohe!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Retrobowl bilang isang Chrome extension - Subukan mo ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Retrobowl en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez maintenant !
short.he: Juega a Retrobowl como una extensión de Chrome. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Jouez à Retrobowl sous forme d'extension Chrome - Essayez-le maintenant!
short.hu: Játssz a Retrobowl nevű játékkal Chrome-ban, próbáld ki most!
short.id: Spil Retrobowl som en Chrome-udvidelse - Prøv det nu!
short.it: Gioca a Retrobowl come estensione di Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.lv: Spēlējiet Retrobowl kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Izvēlēties tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Retrobowl sebagai sambungan Chrome - Cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Retrobowl als een Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu uit!
short.no: Juega a Retrobowl como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Zagraj w Retrobowl jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Retrobowl ca extensie Chrome - Încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Retrobowl в качестве расширения для Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Predvajajte Retrobowl kot razširitev za Chrome - Poskusite zdaj!
short.th: เล่น Retrobowl ในรูปแบบของส่วนขยาย Chrome - ลองเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Oyunu Chrome uzantısı olarak Retrobowl - Şimdi deneyin!
short.vi: Chơi Retrobowl như một tiện ích Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在 Chrome 扩展中玩 Retrobowl - 立即尝试！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏈 Retro Bowl: Ultimate Pixel Football Experience! 🏆

Dive into the thrilling world of American football with Retro Bowl! 🏃‍♂️💨

🕹️ Experience the nostalgia of classic 8-bit graphics with modern, addictive gameplay.
🏅 Build your dream team, manage your roster, and lead them to glory!
🏟️ Play through seasons, compete in the Retro Bowl, and become a legend.

Features:
✅ Easy to learn, challenging to master controls
✅ Dynamic weather conditions affect gameplay
✅ Develop your players' skills and boost team morale
✅ Deal with the press and keep your fans happy
✅ Enjoy endless hours of football fun, anytime, anywhere!

Whether you're a die-hard football fan or new to the sport, Retro Bowl offers an engaging and entertaining experience for all! 🎮🏆

Download now and start your journey to football greatness! 🌟 Are you ready for some football? 🏈

Want more excitement? Click the menu icon in the top-left corner to discover and play even more awesome games! 🎲🕹️🃏
